JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Start your IT career with GenSpark

Are you ready to launch your career in technology? GenSpark is here to help you get started, even if you
don’t have an extensive IT background. They provide hands-on training to give you the skills you need to
succeed as a programmer, no prior experience required.

What You’ll Get:

  • Paid Training: During your first 5-12 weeks, you will be taught everything you need to know about programming, step-by-step. You’ll learn how to review, analyze, and develop software for large scale systems.
  • Real Job Experience: After training, you’ll work on exciting projects for Gensparks clients, applying your new skills in real-world scenarios.
  • A Path to Success: Most GenSpark graduates move directly into jobs with top employers in the tech industry.
No tech background? No problem.

If you’re eager to learn, GenSpark will teach you everything you need to know to start your journey in IT.
They are looking for:

  • A willingness to learn and grow.
  • A genuine interest in technology – whether you’ve dabbled in IT or enjoy solving tech problems.
  • The ability to commit to an 18-month role after completing training.

Why Choose GenSpark?

  • Full-time, paid training to jumpstart your career.
  • A chance to work with industry-leading companies after completing the program.

Ready to invest in your future? Apply today!

For more information, contact Xenia Rosiak at xrr@capaxrecruitment.com or visit www.genspark.net.
Must be based in or around Copenhagen.
